known_issues: Message icon in each role appears empty; needs dummy/placeholder content

existing_features.title: Fix chat seeding so the message drawer is not empty for any authenticated role (User, NGO, DeliveryPartner, Admin) by normalizing the session role values to the values expected by the chat seeding logic, and ensure each role has at least one dummy thread with at least one message.

Add a safe UI fallback in the chat drawer so that if threads are empty for any reason, the drawer displays a dummy welcome conversation preview (participant name, last message, timestamp) instead of an empty state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix empty message icon in each role by adding a dummy message/icon placeholder

projectName: Populate chat/message icon with dummy conversations for all roles
